channel.title: Staff List
channel.description: I was wondering how I would make my stafflist say if we're online or offline ;o Right now it just says whos staff, but how would I do it o-o

item.title: Staff List
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Okay, before someone is an idiot and tells you to put any code into process of client. Here’s something I said people should do for staff lists like that:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:536392”]Why does everyone do it this way?
Why not on initialize and destruct you just put something like:

and then the method updatePlayers would be like:

public void updatePlayers(){ for (Player client : PlayerHandler.players) { if (client != null) { ((Client) client).sendFrame126("@or2@Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " ", 29155); } } }

I’m sure you could even put the for-loop somewhere else and skip making a method but eh.[/quote]

That should be a good base for you to work off of.

Read full topic

item.title: Staff List
item.dc:creator: @lol_space1 lol space
item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

getPA().sendFrame126("@cya@DRGPvP Stafflist!", 29266); getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Owner:@whi@ Trevor", 29296); getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Owner:@whi@ Lee Adam", 29297); getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Owner:", 29298); getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@Admin:", 29299); getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@Admin:", 29300); getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Moderator:@whi@ Real Og", 29301); getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Moderator:@whi@", 29302); getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Moderator:@whi@", 29303); getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Moderator:@whi@", 29304); getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Moderator:@whi@", 29305); getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@GFX Designer - ", 29306); getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@GFX Designer - ", 29307); getPA().sendFrame126("@red@--------------------------------------", 29308); getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@Report DUPES AND GLITCHES", 29309); getPA().sendFrame126("@mag@ TO STAFF", 29311);
Thats my stafflist and I was wondering how to make it auto-matically update if the owner or mod is online / offline

Read full topic

item.title: Staff List
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

lol space:

I was wondering how I would make my stafflist say if we’re online or offline ;o Right now it just says whos staff, but how would I do it o-o

Provide us with some code to base it off of. We can’t just assume what your server/source/base/whateveryoucallthatshit is.

Read full topic
